tags.name: bayern-atlas
tags.description:
A WebComponent that embeds the BayernAtlas in your page.

## API philosophy

- In order to declaratively setup the map you can use **attributes**  which are initially read
- **Attributes** as well as **Getter-Properties** reflect the current state of the map
- Use the **methods** to programmatically change / modify the map

## Coordinates and reference systems
- The map can take coordinates in both the 4326 and 25832 reference systems (default is 4326)
- The map itself can output coordinates in different reference systems (default is 4326). See `ec_srid` attribute for more information

attributes.name: c
attributes.description: The Center coordinate (longitude,latitude / easting,northing) in `4326` (lon, lat) or in `25832`. Example: `c="11,48"`

attributes.name: z
attributes.description: The Zoom level (0-20) of the map. Example: `z="8"`.

attributes.name: r
attributes.description: The rotation of the map (in rad). Example: `r="0.5"`.

attributes.name: l
attributes.description: The layers of the map. Example: `l="layer_a,layer_b"`.

attributes.name: l_v
attributes.description: The visibility of the layers of the map. Example: `l_v="true,false"`.

attributes.name: l_o
attributes.description: The opacity of the layers of the map. Example: `l_o="1,0.5"`.

attributes.name: ec_srid
attributes.description: Designated SRID of returned coordinates (e.g. of geometries). One of `3857`, `4326` , `25832`. Default is `4326`. Example: `ec_srid="25832"`

attributes.name: ec_geometry_format
attributes.description: Designated Type (format) of returned features. One of `ewkt`, `kml`, `geojson`, `gpx`. Default is `ewkt`. Example: `ec_geometry_format="geoJson"`.

attributes.name: ec_map_activation
attributes.description: Display the map insensitive for user interactions unless the user activates the map via a button. Example: `ec_map_activation="true"`.

attributes.name: ec_link_to_app
attributes.description: Display a chip that opens the current view in the BayernAtlas. Example: `ec_link_to_app="true"`.

attributes.name: ec_draw_tool
attributes.description: Display the drawing tool for the types `point`, `line`, `polygon`: Example: `ec_draw_tool="point,line,polygon"`.

properties.name: center
properties.description:
Returns the current center coordinate in map projection or in the configured SRID.
Returns `null` if the map is not yet initialized.

properties.name: zoom
properties.description: Returns the current zoom level of the map or `null` if the map is not yet initialized.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: Returns the rotation of the map (in rad) or `null` if the map is not yet initialized.

properties.name: layers
properties.description: Returns the IDs of the layers of the map or. Returns `[]` if the map is not yet initialized.

properties.name: layersVisibility
properties.description: Returns the visibility of the layers of the map or `[]` if the map is not yet initialized.

properties.name: layersOpacity
properties.description: Returns the opacity of the layers of the map or `[]` if the map is not yet initialized.

properties.name: GEORESOURCE_WEB
properties.description: Returns the identifier (GeoResource ID) for the default raster image map (`"Webkarte"`)

properties.name: GEORESOURCE_WEB_GRAY
properties.description: Returns the identifier (GeoResource ID) for the grayscale raster image map (`"Webkarte S/W"`)

properties.name: GEORESOURCE_AERIAL
properties.description: Returns the identifier (GeoResource ID) for the arial image with labels (`"Luftbild + Beschriftung"`)

properties.name: GEORESOURCE_TOPOGRAPHIC
properties.description: Returns the identifier (GeoResource ID) for the topographic aster image map (`"Topographische Karte"`)

properties.name: GEORESOURCE_HISTORIC
properties.description: Returns the identifier (GeoResource ID) for the historic map (`"Historische Karte"`)

properties.name: GEORESOURCE_WEB_VECTOR
properties.description: Returns the identifier (GeoResource ID) for the default vector data map (`"Web Vector Standard"`)

properties.name: GEORESOURCE_WEB_VECTOR_GRAY
properties.description: Returns the identifier (GeoResource ID) for the grayscale vector data map (`"Web Vector Grau"`)

events.name: baLoad
events.description: Fired when the BayernAtlas is loaded

events.name: baChange
events.description:
Fired when the state of the BayernAtlas map has changed.
See `event.detail` for the payload of the event.
The following changes are supported:
`c` - The center of the map has changed
`z` - The zoom level of the map has changed
`r` - The rotation of the map has changed
`l` - List of layers has changed
`l_v` - The visibility of a layer has changed
`l_o` - The opacity of a layer has changed

events.name: baFeatureSelect
events.description:
Fired when one or more features are selected.
See `event.detail` for the payload of the event.

events.name: baGeometryChange
events.description:
Fired when the user creates or modifies a geometry.
See `event.detail` for the payload of the event.
